comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: for the site - 1. I would change the name - the name sounds like a bitpay/paypal type of name.2. in taking some of the pictures - ie the 2023 squirrel bits muppets set - remove the foam padding in the capsule for the pictures.3. allow seeing the prices without registration.I choose "c"

comments.author: tldr-hodl
comments.body: Not part-taking, but yeah, prices visible only after registration is a really big no-no...I lost any interest in the site right after finding that out, sorry.

comments.author: 2stout
comments.body: Pricing view for those not registered and a discount pricing view for those that are or become registered, as to provide an incentive to register or for those who have previously registered- doesn't have to be a bank breaker.Slot 3 please, Thx!

comments.author: Remsjack
comments.body: I agree, price viewing after registration is problematic. Beside that I like the site and I hope it will display more pieces in a not so distant future  7 - Remsjack, please, and thank you for this giveaway

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Eclipse33 on November 08, 2023, 07:57:18 PMYou can claim a slot by following these five simple steps:⭕ Step one: Merit this thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5465798.0There is a button on the right side of the post header that says +Merit press this button and give the thread one or more merits. Meriting the official eclipsepayments.com thread is the first step.Remove this requirement as soon as possible.Merit as a condition for participation in the giveaway is an indirect way of buying merit. Even if it is not interpreted like that, it is not desirable to ask for merit, then it's begging.Quote from: hilariousandco on January 16, 2018, 12:24:24 PMCan I ask for merit?There is no need to do this and this behaviour is usually seen as 'merit begging' which is frowned upon by the community and may lead to you receiving negative feedback. Keep making quality, constructive posts and you will surely be rewarded over time. Can I sell merit?Selling merit is disallowed.Also step two, demanding and conditioning to comment in the ANN thread and offering a reward for it is prohibited.

comments.author: erre
comments.body: Slot a - erreI merited the post, after that I read the above post and well, that this could indeed be illegal according to forum rules. I think that effectly you should remove that requirement.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on November 08, 2023, 10:31:54 PM...Absolutely, I was just creating the same post. Why some one should be forced to merit that topic? I mean it should be merit for sure, but not as a condition for taking part in a giveaway
